arts.ttl: Athletic Club star Nico Williams names the 2 Barcelona stars who ‘kept telling me to join’
arts.sum: Athletic Club star Nico Williams has admitted that two leading members of the first-team ranks at Barcelona pushed hard to convince him to join the club earlier this year. The…

arts.ttl: Barcelona turn attention to Liverpool as they hunt world-class alternative to Nico Williams
arts.sum: Barcelona were unable to sign Nico Williams from Athletic Club in the summer, and it now appears they’ve turned their attentions to landing one Liverpool superstar. The Catalan giants have certainly been reborn under Hansi Flick, and they managed to complete dilute Kylian Mbappe’s influence in the recent El Clasico.
